title.rendered: Disposable Oral Medication Syringe With Adaptor

content.rendered:
oral syringe

Size: 1ml, 2/3ml, 5ml, 10ml, 20ml

With adaptor

Package:1pc/bag

1. Sufficiently transparent barrel allows easy measurement of the volume contained in the syringe and detection of air bubble.

2. Graduated scale on the barrel is easy to read.

3. The plunger fits the inside of barrel very well to allow for free and smooth movement.

4. KDL needle has more reasonable needle tip edge angle ,the maximum to reduce the puncture pain.

5. Non-toxic, non-pyrogenic and EO sterilized

6. SIize:1ml,2ml,3ml,5ml,10ml,20ml,30ml,50ml,60ml

7. With needle or without needle. The type of needle according to the customer request. the sizes 18G to 26G are available.

8. CE & ISO certificate

Product features

Some syringes have a screw port design, and the double-threaded needle is used for better post-destruction treatment. The existing self-destructing syringe is used to retract the needle after use, to catch the core rod or to automatically break the core rod. Can not be used again with polypropylene material, good biocompatibility, high transparency, clear and accurate tick mark, good sliding performance, easy to use, self-destructing structure, easy to use after single use Harmful treatment
